00024 HierarchyView::HierarchyView(QWidget *parent, 
00025                                                          LibraryInterface* handler,
00026                                                          HierarchyFilter* filter):
00027 QTreeView(parent),
00028 handler_(handler),
00029 filter_(filter),
00030 startPos_(),
00031 dragIndex_(),
00032 openDesignAction_(NULL),
00033 openCompAction_(NULL),
00034 createNewComponentAction_(NULL),
00035 createNewDesignAction_(NULL),
00036 exportAction_(NULL),
00037 openBusAction_(NULL),
00038 addSignalsAction_(NULL),
00039 createBusAction_(NULL),
00040 openSystemAction_(NULL),
00041 openPlatformAction_(NULL),
00042 openPFStackAction_(NULL),
00043 openApplicationAction_(NULL),
00044 openEndpointAction_(NULL),
00045 openSWDesignAction_(NULL) {
00046 
00047         // the view can be sorted
00048         setSortingEnabled(true);
00049 
00050         // user can select items in the view
00051         setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectItems);
00052 
00053         // only one item can be selected at a time
00054         setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00055 
00056         // Items can not be edited
00057         setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);
00058 
00059         // user can't expand/collapse items in a normal way because the 
00060         // event handler for mouse press events has been reimplemented
00061         setItemsExpandable(false);
00062 
00063         setupActions();
00064 }
00065 
00066 HierarchyView::~HierarchyView() {
00067 }

00069 void HierarchyView::setupActions() {
00070         openDesignAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Design"), this);
00071         openDesignAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open a hierarchical design"));
00072         openDesignAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open a hierarchical design"));
00073         connect(openDesignAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00074                 this, SLOT(onOpenDesign()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00075 
00076         openCompAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Component"), this);
00077         openCompAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Open component editor"));
00078         openCompAction_->setToolTip(tr("Open component editor"));
00079         connect(openCompAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00080                 this, SLOT(onOpenComponent()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00081 
00082         createNewComponentAction_ = new QAction(tr("Create New Component"), this);
00083         createNewComponentAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Create new component"));
00084         createNewComponentAction_->setToolTip(tr("Create new component"));
00085         connect(createNewComponentAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00086                 this, SLOT(onCreateComponent()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00087 
00088         createNewDesignAction_ = new QAction(tr("Create New Design"), this);
00089         createNewDesignAction_->setStatusTip(tr("Create new design"));
00090         createNewDesignAction_->setToolTip(tr("Create new design"));
00091         connect(createNewDesignAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00092                 this, SLOT(onCreateDesign()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00093

00098                 this, SLOT(onExportAction()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00099 
00100         openBusAction_ = new QAction(tr("Open Bus"), this);

00155 void HierarchyView::onOpenComponent() {
00156         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00157         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00158                 emit openComponent(filter_->mapToSource(index));
00159         }
00160 }

00163         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00164         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00165                 emit openComponent(filter_->mapToSource(index));
00166         }
00167 }

00171         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {

00176 void HierarchyView::onCreateComponent() {
00177         emit createNewComponent(filter_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));
00178 }

00185         emit createNewAbsDef(filter_->mapToSource(currentIndex()));

00192 void HierarchyView::onExportAction() {
00193         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00194         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00195                 emit exportItem(filter_->mapToSource(index));
00196         }

00199 void HierarchyView::contextMenuEvent( QContextMenuEvent* event ) {
00200         Q_ASSERT_X(event, "LibraryTreeView::contextMenuEvent",
00201                 "Invalid event pointer given as parameter");
00202 
00203         // accept the event so it is not passed forwards
00204         event->accept();
00205 
00206         QModelIndex current = currentIndex();
00207         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00208 
00209         // if nothing was chosen
00210         if (!current.isValid()) {
00211                 return;
00212         }
00213 
00214         // get original model index so internalPointer can be used
00215         QModelIndex sourceIndex = filter_->mapToSource(current);
00216 
00217         HierarchyItem* item = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(sourceIndex.internalPointer());
00218         VLNV vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00219 
00220         // create a menu to show contextMenu actions
00221         QMenu menu(this);
00222 
00223         bool hierarchical = false;
00224 
00225         // if item can be identified as single item
00226         if (vlnv.isValid()) {
00227 
00228                 // parse the model
00229                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00230                 Q_ASSERT_X(libComp, "HierarchyView::contextMenuEvent()",
00231                         "Object was not found in library.");
00232 
00233                 // if component
00234                 if (item->type() == HierarchyItem::COMPONENT) {
00235                         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00236 
00237                         // depending on the type of the component
00238                         switch (component->getComponentImplementation()) {
00239                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS: {
00240                                         menu.addAction(openSystemAction_);
00241                                         break;
00242                                                                                            }
00243                                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW: {
00244                                         
00245                                         KactusAttribute::SWType swType = component->getComponentSWType();
00246                                         if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM) {
00247                                                 menu.addAction(openPlatformAction_);
00248                                                 
00249                                                 if (component->isHierarchical())
00250                                                         menu.addAction(openPFStackAction_);
00251                                         }
00252 
00253                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_APPLICATION)
00254                                                 menu.addAction(openApplicationAction_);
00255 
00256                                         else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_ENDPOINTS)
00257                                                 menu.addAction(openEndpointAction_);
00258 
00259                     else if (swType == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING)
00260                         menu.addAction(openSWDesignAction_);
00261 
00262                                         break;
00263                                                                                           }
00264                                 default: {
00265                                         if (component->isHierarchical()) {
00266                                                 menu.addAction(openDesignAction_);
00267                                                 hierarchical = true;
00268                                         }
00269 
00270                                         menu.addAction(openCompAction_);
00271                                         // only if just one object is selected
00272                                         if (indexes.size() == 1)
00273                                                 menu.addAction(createNewComponentAction_);
00274 
00275                                         // if component was not hierarchical then design can be created for it.
00276                                         if (!hierarchical && indexes.size() == 1)
00277                                                 menu.addAction(createNewDesignAction_);
00278                                         break;
00279                                                  }
00280                         }
00281                 }
00282                 else if (item->type() == HierarchyItem::BUSDEFINITION) {
00283 
00284                         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComp.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00285 
00286                         // make sure the bus is for hardware
00287                         if (busDef->getType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW) {
00288                                 menu.addAction(openBusAction_);
00289                                 menu.addAction(addSignalsAction_);
00290                                 menu.addAction(createBusAction_);
00291                         }
00292                 }
00293                 else if (item->type() == HierarchyItem::ABSDEFINITION) {
00294                         menu.addAction(openBusAction_);
00295                         menu.addAction(createBusAction_);
00296                 }
00297         }
00298         
00299         menu.addAction(exportAction_);
00300         menu.exec(event->globalPos());
00301 }

00303 void HierarchyView::mouseDoubleClickEvent( QMouseEvent * event ) {
00304         Q_ASSERT_X(event, "LibraryTreeView::contextMenuEvent",
00305                 "Invalid event pointer given as parameter");
00306 
00307         // accept the event so it is not passed forwards
00308         event->accept();
00309 
00310         QModelIndex current = currentIndex();
00311 
00312         // if nothing was chosen
00313         if (!current.isValid()) {
00314                 return;
00315         }
00316 
00317         emit openComponent(filter_->mapToSource(current));
00318 
00319         // let the default handler process the event
00320         QTreeView::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00321 }
00322 
00323 void HierarchyView::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent *event ) {
00324         if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton) {
00325                 startPos_ = event->pos();
00326                 QModelIndex index = indexAt(startPos_);
00327                 dragIndex_ = filter_->mapToSource(index);
00328         }
00329         QTreeView::mousePressEvent(event);
00330 }
00331 
00332 void HierarchyView::mouseReleaseEvent( QMouseEvent * event ) {
00333         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00334         // if shift or control was not pressed and left mouse button was
00335         if ((event->modifiers() & Qt::ShiftModifier) == 0 &&
00336                 (event->modifiers() & Qt::ControlModifier) == 0 &&
00337                 event->button() == Qt::LeftButton) {
00338 
00339                         // if the item is not yet expanded
00340                         if (!isExpanded(index))
00341                                 expand(index);
00342 
00343                         // if item was expanded then close it
00344                         else
00345                                 collapse(index);
00346         }
00347 
00348         if (index.isValid()) {
00349                 QModelIndex sourceIndex = filter_->mapToSource(index);
00350                 HierarchyItem* item = static_cast<HierarchyItem*>(sourceIndex.internalPointer());
00351                 emit componentSelected(item->getVLNV());
00352         }
00353 
00354         QTreeView::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00355 }
00356 
00357 void HierarchyView::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent *event ) {
00358         // if left mouse button is pressed down
00359         if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton) {
00360 
00361                 // calculate the distance of the drag
00362                 int distance = (event->pos() - startPos_).manhattanLength();
00363 
00364                 // make sure the drag distance is large enough to start the drag
00365                 if (distance >= QApplication::startDragDistance()) {
00366                         emit dragInitiated(dragIndex_);
00367                 }
00368         }
00369         QTreeView::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00370 }
00371 
00372 void HierarchyView::setCurrentIndex( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00373 
00374         QModelIndex temp = index;
00375         expand(temp);
00376         
00377         // expand the whole tree up to the index
00378         while (temp.parent().isValid()) {
00379                 temp = temp.parent();
00380                 expand(temp);
00381         }
00382 
00383         // use the default implementation
00384         QTreeView::setCurrentIndex(index);
00385 }
00386 
00387 void HierarchyView::setSelectedIndexes( const QModelIndexList& indexes ) {
00388         // clear any previously selected items
00389         clearSelection();
00390 
00391         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00392                 
00393                 if (!index.isValid())
00394                         continue;
00395 
00396                 selectionModel()->select(index, QItemSelectionModel::Select);
00397 
00398                 QModelIndex temp = index;
00399                 expand(temp);
00400 
00401                 // expand the whole tree up to the index
00402                 while (temp.parent().isValid()) {
00403                         temp = temp.parent();
00404                         expand(temp);
00405                 }
00406         }
00407 }
